name: The Haunted Library (itch)
description:
In this game, you are watching a VHS tape that was found in a house owned by missing Thomas Moore. According to the testimony of neighbors Thomas was last seen entering his new inherited house but he never left. 

Police searched the house but found nothing exept the camera.

What happened to Thomas Moore?

State of the game

- Demo version +- 20 min.

- This game was tested only by me so maybe you can encounter some bugs.

Feedback

We much appreciate every comment we get from you. 

If you like this short demo you can rate this game or even make a donation for its development. Thanks again and most importantly have fun.

How to play?

W,A,S,D - Movement
E - Interact
TAB - Inventory/Objectives
Left Mouse Button - Video buttons controls
